english.segment1: Verse 1: The rising Sun that fills the sky. The starry host that lights the night. Reflecting Your glory
english.segment2: The mountain heights, forever stand. The rain that falls to soak the land. Respond to Your glory
english.segment3: . Chorus: Almighty God, in every way. You are above and beyond understanding. If we did not praise, the rocks would cry out. Glorious God, high above understanding
english.segment4: . Verse 2: The vast expanse of earth and sea. Held by You in harmony. Speaks of Your glory
english.segment5: All You've made, since time began. Life itself; Your perfect plan. And it's all for Your glory
english.segment6: . Chorus: Almighty God, in every way. You are above and beyond understanding. If we did not praise, the rocks would cry out. Glorious God, high above understanding
english.segment7: . Creation joins as one to sing. What A Glorious God.. So far above all earthly things
english.segment8: . Almighty God, in every way. You are above and beyond understanding. If we did not praise, the rocks would cry out. Glorious God, high above understanding
english.segment9: . Almighty God, in every way. You are above and beyond understanding. If we did not praise, the rocks would cry out. Glorious God, high above understanding.
